decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed rear extensions to the building, by reason of their size, position, location of windows and appearance, would appear overbearing and would be detrimental to the outlook and sense of privacy of the adjacent neighbour. This would be contrary to policies ENV-B.1.1 (New Development) and C.3.2 (New or Extended Health Facilities) of the adopted Unitary Development Plan 2003; and the UDP Supplementary Planning Guidance.

Condition : 2 - The proposed porch canopy, by reason of its disproportionate size, design and appearance, would result in an obtrusive features that would be an unsympathetic addition to and out of character with the existing building and local area and would be detrimental to the street scene. The proposal fails to comply with policies ENV-B.1.1 (New Development) and C.3.2 (New or Extended Health Facilities) of the London Borough of Hounslow Unitary Development Plan and the Council's Residential Extension Guidelines.

Condition : 3 - The propose development would fail to provide adequate off street parking for the use, which is likely to result in conditions adverse to safety and the free flow of traffic on the adjacent highway. This would be contrary to policies ENV-B.1.1 (New Development), C.3.2 (New or Extended Health Facilities) and T.1.4 (Car and Cycle Parking & Servicing Facilities For Developments) of the adopted Unitary Development Plan 2003.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the surgery.
